summary: Simple, lightweight interface to manage some basic Skyrim options.
descriptionHtml:
[b]I am no longer supporting my tools as I am currently developing my [url=http://skynet.hipolipolopig.us]Skynet (Skyrim Co-Op) project[/url][/b]

This is a lightweight version of my [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=211]Spriggan[/url] project, minus the settings management. 

This is to be combined with Spriggan in the next release, so there will be no further development.

Currently, this includes;[list][*]\'Neat Tweaks\' Menu (Only [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=145]one[/url] at the moment, please suggest more!)
[*]Audio Controls
[*]Automated Character Updating
[*]Advanced and Hidden graphics options
[*]Better resolution system
[*]Automated mod installation (Heavy beta). Simply select the archive containing the mod (Tested with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=243]this one[/url]) and this little puppy will do the rest :)
[*]Built-In readme
[*]Character Management (Backwards-compatible with Spriggan\'s system)
[*]The Large Address Aware Fix
[*]Force-Installing Skyrim to the registry
[*]Forcing any resolution and full-screen[/list]

[b]Requires[/b]
.Net Framework 4.0

[b]Thanks to...[/b]
The NetPE team (netpe.codeplex.com) for the PE header framework used to apply the LAA fix

Source available upon request ^-^
author: Hipolipolopigus
